price: 76. Bandimi babundaka na nzela ya Allah, kasi bapagano babundaka na nzela ya motomboki.(1) Bobundisa balandi ya satana; mpamba te likita ya satana ezalaka makasi te.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱلطَّٰغُوتِ فَقَٰتِلُوٓاْ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۖ إِنَّ كَيۡدَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ كَانَ ضَعِيفًا
footnotes: 1 Bótala mokapo 60, 51. Mpe suratu Al-Baqarah: Mokapo 256, 257.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū yuqātilūna fī sabīli al-lahi wa-alladhīna kafarū yuqātilūna fī sabīli al-ṭāghūti faqātilū awliyāa al-shayṭāni inna kayda al-shayṭāni kāna ḍaʿīfan
